item.title: Vortices and Factorization
item.description: arXiv:2403.07537v3 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: We review applications of factorization methods to the problem of finding stationary point vortex patterns in two-dimensional fluid mechanics. Then we present a new class of patterns related to periodic analogs of Schrodinger operators from the ``even" bi-spectral family. We also show that patterns related to soliton solutions of the KdV hierarchy constitute complete solution of the problem for certain classes of vortex systems.
item.dc:creator: Igor Loutsenko, Oksana Yermolayeva
